729448f-a.title: Richmond: Richmond Terrace - Jewett Avenue
729448f-a.text:
Richmond Terrace, north side, west from Bodines Pond
(west of Clove Road) to Jewett Avenue. Part of the sign,which
is a fire-insurance advertisement, reads: ''Vrs O'Booley's Cow
knocked over the lamp which started the Great Chicago Fire.
Not the Cowts Fault.'
March 5, 1927
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
729448f-a.folder: Richmond Terrace & Jewett Avenue, Staten Island, NY
